AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: chemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a trained chemist on an Urbworld. [PAWN_pronoun] learned much about synthesizing useful materials from various chemicals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: plant enthusiast
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed going out into the woods near [PAWN_possessive] town to collect various nice-smelling plants.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: fullmetal alchemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an alchemist whose mom died. In an attempt to bring her back, [PAWN_pronoun] practiced human alchemy. Instead of bringing her back, however, [PAWN_pronoun] turned [PAWN_possessive] brother into a meat mountain named Alphonse. It was depressing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: kingpin chemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once an innocent chemistry teacher before getting involved in the meth business. [PAWN_pronoun] grew more and more powerful until becoming kingpin of a vast drug empire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: chemistry kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] got a chemistry set for [PAWN_possessive] birthday. Unfortunately, [PAWN_pronoun] used it for evil by making crude meth, and it was taken away by [PAWN_possessive] parents.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: herbologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] collected medicinal herbs for [PAWN_possessive] tribe, an important role in a society without modern medicine.
